            Programs:

            program codeforces_31A

                implicit none

                integer :: n, f=0, k, i,j, t, lastk=0, lasti=0, lastj=0

                integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: a

                read(*,*) n

                allocate(a(n))

                read(*,*) a

                lastk =-1  ! initial values

                lasti =-1

                lastj =-1

                do k =1, n

                    if ( f .eq.1 ) exit  ! if found, break

                    t = a(k)

                    do i =1, n

                        do j =1, n-1

                            if( i ==j ) cycle 

                            if( a(i)+a(j) == t ) then

                                lastk =k

                                lasti=i

                                lastj=j

                                f =1 

                                exit 

                                !

                    So putting it all into code:

                    Now, considering all these steps:

                    Also, in the code, the variables lastk, lasti, lastj are initially set to 0, but in the case when f is 1, will be overwritten.

                    So now, compiling all the code:

                    program codeforces_31A

                    ! Declarations:

                        implicit none 

                        integer :: n, f, k,i,j,t, lastk=0, lasti=0, lastj=0

                        integer, dimension(:), allocatable ::a 

                        ! read n, allocate array, read data

                        read(*,*) n 

                        allocate(a(n)) 

                        read(*,*) a 

                        f=0 

                        lastk=0 

                        lasti=0 

                        lastj=0 

                        do k =1, n 

                            if (f ==1 ) exit 

                            t = a(k) 

                            do i =1, n 

                                do j =1, n-1 

                                    if (i ==j ) cycle 

                                    if (a(i)+a(j) == t ) then 

                                        lastk =k 

                                        lasti =i 

                                        lastj =j 

                                        f=1 

                                        exit 

                                    end if 

                                end do 

                                if (f ==1 ) exit 

                            end do 

                            if (f ==1 ) exit 

                        end do 

                        if ( f ==1 ) then 

                            ! output lastk lastj lasti 

                            print*, lastk, lastj, lasti 

                        else 

                            print*, '-1' 

                        end if 

                        deallocate(a) 

                    end program
